summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V234000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM) AND STATED THAT THE PARTS NEEDED WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE DEALER DID NOT PROVIDE A SPECIFIC DATE WHEN THE PARTS WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE AND AS AN INTERIM REPAIR THE DEALER INDICATED THAT THEY DISCONNECTED THE REAR QUARTER VENT WINDOW SWITCH. THE CONTACT STATED THAT UPON FURTHER INSPECTING THE VEHICLE, IT WAS NOTICED THAT THE COMPONENT WAS NOT DISCONNECTED. THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED AND PROVIDED AN APPOINTMENT TO RE-INSPECT THE VEHICLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND COULD NOT PROVIDE AN ESTIMATED DATE FOR WHEN THE VEHICLE WOULD RECEIVE THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.
